original_text: Peter followed him at a distance, right into the courtyard of the high priest. There he sat with the guards and warmed himself at the fire.
korean_text: 베드로가 예수를 멀찍이 따라 대제사장의 집 뜰 안까지 들어가서 아랫사람들과 함께 앉아 불을 쬐더라

sentences.original_text: Peter followed him at a distance
right into the courtyard of the high priest
There he sat with the guards
and warmed himself at the fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 불 곁에서 몸을 따뜻하게 했습니다
